page.title: 19PROJECT WEEK
page.content: { South Craven Comprehensive School}is in Crosshills.The week before breaking up for the summer holiday a project week is held, in July. { Project Week}is when pupils participate in different activities,of their own choice,over a period of four days.The third and fourth and sixth years can choose from a vast variety of projects ranging from windsurfing,sailing to art and design and decorating your own bedroom. The first and second years don't do just one project over the four days.They enjoy a film,"It's a knockout" competition,a day trip and a days activity. Overall{Project Week}is fun.The pupils find it enjoyable and it gives them a chance to experience different things.
